package.name: thunderbird
package.unpack: rm -rf comm-esr l10n tar xf ${SRCDIR}/thunderbird-${PKGVERSION}.source.tar.xz mv thunderbird-${PKGVERSION} comm-esr mkdir l10n tar -C l10n -xf ${SRCDIR}/thunderbird-${PKGVERSION}.source.de-es-pl-ru.tar.xz tar xf ${SRCDIR}/dotcargo-i686-20170621.tar.gz
package.build:
export PATH=` pwd `/.cargo/bin:$PATH echo $SHELL export SHELL=/bin/bash echo $SHELL # export CFLAGS+=" -fno-delete-null-pointer-checks -fno-lifetime-dse -fno-schedule-insns2" && # export CXXFLAGS+=" -fno-delete-null-pointer-checks -fno-lifetime-dse -fno-schedule-insns2"
workdir=` pwd ` cd comm-esr
mkdir -p mozilla/tb-build sed -i 's%PWD%'${workdir}'%g' .mozconfig sed -i 's%# ac_add_options --with-system-png%ac_add_options --with-system-png%g' .mozconfig sed -i 's%ac_add_options --with-system-libevent%# ac_add_options --with-system-libevent%g' .mozconfig sed -i 's%mk_add_options MOZ_OBJDIR%# mk_add_options MOZ_OBJDIR%g' .mozconfig sed -i 's%ac_add_options --enable-system-cairo%# ac_add_options --enable-system-cairo%g' .mozconfig sed -i 's%ac_add_options --with-system-libvpx%# ac_add_options --with-system-libvpx%g' .mozconfig sed -i 's%ac_add_options --enable-gstreamer%# ac_add_options --enable-alsa%g' mozilla-release/.mozconfig echo 'ac_add_options --disable-gconf' >> .mozconfig if [ -n "$DISTCC_POTENTIAL_HOSTS" ] ; then export CC='distcc gcc' export CXX='distcc g++' jobcount=` expr $DISTCC_HOSTCOUNT '*' 3 ` [ "$jobcount" -gt 12 ] && jobcount=12 sed -i "s%MOZ_MAKE_FLAGS=\"-j4\"%MOZ_MAKE_FLAGS=\"-j${jobcount} CC='distcc gcc' CXX='distcc g++'\"%g" .mozconfig make -f client.mk else sed -i "s%MOZ_MAKE_FLAGS=\"-j4\"%MOZ_MAKE_FLAGS=\"-j4 CC=gcc CXX=g++\"%g" .mozconfig make -f client.mk fi echo '===> Trying to find libxul.so...' find obj-` uname -m `-pc-linux-gnu/dist -type f -name libxul.so
ccount=0 # ./obj-i686-pc-linux-gnu/dist/lib/libxul.so while [ '!' -f obj-` uname -m `-pc-linux-gnu/dist/bin/libxul.so -a $ccount -lt 2 ] && \ [ '!' -f obj-` uname -m `-unknown-linux-gnu/dist/bin/libxul.so -a $ccount -lt 2 ] ; do echo '===> Linking libxul.so failed, trying again in 5 minutes...' sleep 300 make -f client.mk build ccount=` expr $ccount + 1 ` done [ -f obj-` uname -m `-pc-linux-gnu/dist/bin/libxul.so ] || [ -f obj-` uname -m `-unknown-linux-gnu/dist/bin/libxul.so ] || exit 1
# Now try to build the language packs for packlang in de es-ES pl ru fr it nl pt-PT da lt lv et sk sl sv-SE bg hr nb-NO ro sr tr cs hu fi el ; do make -C obj-` uname -m `-pc-linux-gnu/mail/locales langpack-${packlang} make -C obj-` uname -m `-unknown-linux-gnu/mail/locales langpack-${packlang} done
# Now try to build the xpi of thunderbird # mv mail/installer/removed-files.in{,.orig} # cat mail/installer/removed-files.in.orig | sed 's%hyphenation/hyph%# hyphenation/hyph%g' > mail/installer/removed-files.in make -C obj-` uname -m `-pc-linux-gnu package make -C obj-` uname -m `-unknown-linux-gnu package
echo '==> Searching Tarballs' find obj-` uname -m `-pc-linux-gnu -name '*.tar.bz2' | sort echo '==> Searching XPIs' find obj-` uname -m `-pc-linux-gnu -name '*.xpi' | sort
package.install:
TARFILE=comm-esr/obj-` uname -m `-pc-linux-gnu/dist/thunderbird-${PKGVERSION}.en-US.linux-` uname -m `.tar.bz2 case $(uname -m) in x86_64) TARFILE=comm-esr/obj-` uname -m `-unknown-linux-gnu/dist/thunderbird-${PKGVERSION}.en-US.linux-` uname -m `.tar.bz2 ;; esac [ -f "$TARFILE" ] || exit 1
mkdir -p ${TGTDIR}/opt mkdir -p ${TGTDIR}/usr/share/mozilla-addons tar -C ${TGTDIR}/opt -xvjf "${TARFILE}" mv ${TGTDIR}/opt/thunderbird ${TGTDIR}/opt/thunderbird-${PKGVERSION}
echo '====> Installing XPIs' install -m 0644 comm-esr/obj-` uname -m `-pc-linux-gnu/mozilla/dist/xpi-stage/gdata-provider-*.en-US.linux-` uname -m `.xpi ${TGTDIR}/usr/share/mozilla-addons install -m 0644 comm-esr/obj-` uname -m `-pc-linux-gnu/mozilla/dist/xpi-stage/lightning-*.en-US.linux-` uname -m `.xpi ${TGTDIR}/usr/share/mozilla-addons
echo '====> Installing Langpacks' # obj-i686-pc-linux-gnu/dist/linux-i686/xpi/thunderbird-38.0.1.es-ES.langpack.xpi mkdir -m 0755 -p ${TGTDIR}/usr/share/mozilla-localization for packlang in de es-ES pl ru fr it nl pt-PT da lt lv et sk sl sv-SE bg hr nb-NO ro sr tr cs hu fi el ; do install -m 0644 comm-esr/obj-` uname -m `-pc-linux-gnu/dist/linux-` uname -m `/xpi/thunderbird-${PKGVERSION}.${packlang}.langpack.xpi \ ${TGTDIR}/usr/share/mozilla-localization done
${TGTDIR}/usr/share/mozilla-addons/
mkdir -p ${TGTDIR}/usr/bin/ mkdir -p ${TGTDIR}/usr/share/icons install -m 0644 ${TGTDIR}/opt/thunderbird-${PKGVERSION}/chrome/icons/default/default256.png ${TGTDIR}/usr/share/icons/thunderbird256.png echo -n '' > ${TGTDIR}/usr/bin/thunderbird cat >> ${TGTDIR}/usr/bin/thunderbird << TBRUN #!/bin/sh
. /etc/rc.defaults . /etc/rc.subr/extractbootparams
langopts="" lc=\$( echo \$LC_ALL | awk -F '.' '{print \$1}' | sed 's/_/-/g' ) langopts="-contentLocale \${lc} -UILocale \${lc}"
[ "\$security" '!=' "smack" ] && exec /opt/thunderbird-${PKGVERSION}/thunderbird \$langopts \$@
if [ "\$#" -lt 1 ] ; then exec sudo /opt/thunderbird-${PKGVERSION}/thunderbird_smack else if ps waux | grep 'surfer /opt/.*/thunderbird-bin' | grep -v grep ; then /opt/thunderbird-${PKGVERSION}/thunderbird \$@ else sudo /opt/thunderbird-${PKGVERSION}/thunderbird_smack & sleep 5 exec /opt/thunderbird-${PKGVERSION}/thunderbird \$@ fi fi
TBRUN
chmod a+rx ${TGTDIR}/usr/bin/thunderbird
echo -n '' > ${TGTDIR}/opt/thunderbird-${PKGVERSION}/thunderbird_smack cat >> ${TGTDIR}/opt/thunderbird-${PKGVERSION}/thunderbird_smack << TBSMACK #!/static/bin/ash
langopts="" lc=\$( echo \$LC_ALL | awk -F '.' '{print \$1}' | sed 's/_/-/g' ) langopts="-contentLocale \${lc} -UILocale \${lc}"
/static/sbin/newsmack internet /static/bin/su surfer -c "/opt/thunderbird-${PKGVERSION}/thunderbird \$langopts"
TBSMACK
chmod a+rx ${TGTDIR}/opt/thunderbird-${PKGVERSION}/thunderbird_smack /sbin/paxctl -m -r ${TGTDIR}/opt/thunderbird-${PKGVERSION}/thunderbird-bin
